snippet: Idaho firefighter died after being struck by a falling tree while working on a fire, officials said. Oregon firefighter was forced to crawl into emergency shelter when winds filled with fire overran the area.
abstract: Firefighter in Idaho is killed after being struck by a falling tree and another firefighter in Oregon is injured as wildfires continue raging across the West.
lead_paragraph: Idaho firefighter died after being struck by a falling tree while working on a fire, officials said. Oregon firefighter was forced to crawl into emergency shelter when winds filled with fire overran the area.

headline.main: Blazes Kill Firefighter in Idaho and Injure Another in Oregon
headline.print_headline: Blazes Kill Firefighter In Idaho and Injure Another In Oregon
